text.title: Che fine ha fatto Luis
text.p: Hello friends of Selvaggio music As you may
have guessed from the title that I have no
idea what title I will give but a title
In short where you understand the content of
this video I will
finally give you the much
awaited
explanations on
Luis's disappearance from the podcast
and above all I want to explain why I have
not been able to give explanations
until now let's
say First of all
what I would like to tell you is that I
would have liked frankly that the one to give
the explanations of his no
longer being on this podcast I would have liked it if
he himself had given these explanations out of respect
for three years of work together out of
respect for the public that watches us
in total transparency and serenity
especially because on this event
immense speculations have been created
totally science fiction gossip when the
truth is much simpler and less
tragic than what you might
think so today I have
the burden of giving these explanations I
don't do it with pleasure because I don't
like giving explanations on
behalf of others but I certainly do
n't like doing it at this moment it's
something I would have done
from the beginning of the episodes that I
started recording alone because the
truth is that ever since I started
hosting the podcast alone, Luis and
I knew that Luis would no longer
be there and I
waited three three episodes before
asking Louis's Management
to basically be able to give at least I
don't say explanations because it would have been
right for him to
give them himself but at least to tell
the public that he would no longer be there
and because obviously this thing has I
believe
irreparably damaged
this format a little because
under
the comments section of every guest
I have brought since Luis has been gone,
practically, we have talked almost exclusively
about Luis and not about the guest Obviously it was
a very predictable thing that could have been
avoided and
this thing has compromised the podcast
How will you ask me at the
moment I have a lot of difficulty finding
guests because if you call
people to talk about sensitive topics
like Cecilia Strada or you call great
athletes, great personalities from the
entertainment and music world, they
are not happy if they come to talk for
an hour at this table and then in the
comments section they only talk about Luis, it
was a predictable scenario I had
asked the favor of being able to at least
say Luis is no longer there If so follow
this podcast only for Luis
know that Luis is not there unfortunately I
was denied this opportunity to give
explanations I believe that this thing was
done with a very specific
and incorrect reason From my point of view
above all because I have not and there has
never been an
intention to put in difficulty a
person with whom I have shared
many beautiful periods of my life and with
whom I have shared a project such as
Musk Wild for my part I have taken let's
say this new this new
parenthesis this new adventure of the
podcast with with
an incentive to try to do better
Musk Wild was born as a
truly totally anarchic environment
I believe that the strength of the format was
precisely in my spontaneity of Luis in
not preparing ourselves at all on the
guests who let's say on the one hand did not
favor a very deep content but
had a side of spontaneity That
inevitably today can no longer
be there since a fundamental part
of this podcast is missing and therefore I decided to
commit myself to preparing myself more on the
episodes I must say that in this Davide
Marra was of great support I do not
deny that for me it was not very
easy to continue doing the podcast
but inside In my opinion once that
the cameras are turned on and that I
sit at this table for me it is always
interesting to talk to the people
who come as guests to this
this show so let's
say that the discouragement took over more
when the episodes obviously went
online but to do the moss Selvaggio
I as long as I'm having fun I will carry on
as long as it is possible Here
Okay let's get to the explanations very
very simply
I do I take a small step back
on how the bus that Selvaggio because it makes
sense to understand the spirit with which
this project moss Selvaggio was born was
born from me from Luis
and it has never been a project that
was about earning money
basically
we have refused many many
economic incomes in these years precisely so as
not to
contaminate in some way the content
that we brought
reason for which for us I think I
can also talk about one of Luis was
truly a parenthesis of great
freedom and fun starting from
this assumption there was a
parenthesis that was let's say more more
work than fun that
was the parenthesis of Sanremo
Sanremo was a project
strongly wanted by me because I thought it
could be useful it was a project
in which neither I and Luis were not paid
practically all the money was
spent basically on the creation
of the format but it was a
very demanding period
Luis I remember that at first he did not
agree on doing this
project and then instead he
told me look let's try to do it It was
a complicated complicated experience
because it was
demanding it was demanding
and personally it was demanding
also because let's not
say It fell in conjunction with a
moment of mine in which my
mental health was not exactly at its best let
's say and subsequently at the end of
this project
there was a discussion a
work discussion in which I
simply pointed out to Louis how
from my point of view
I had the feeling of having to take on
everything
and I had not felt any support from
him a discussion certainly
animated on a work issue that
led us to say at the end of this
conversation let's take a few
weeks to understand what to satisfy and
at the end of this week
I have to say with great surprise because
I knew that we were coming from intense
stressful weeks but I must frankly say I have
never received any alarm bells
from Luis that led me to
think that he wanted abandon the
podcast But in fact after after
this week of reflection he
sends me a message where he tells me I'll try to say it
again Textually so as not to make mistakes
where he basically tells me the format
at the moment has taken on a
connotation that is more Federico's than
Luis's I want to dedicate myself to other
projects I don't want to do the podcast anymore I
have to be totally honest I didn't
take this very well this thing I was hurt I was
very hurt I was hurt also
because we had founded a company
a few weeks before and obviously
this has set up a
very complicated scenario which is why
many will ask themselves
Why is Luis still in the acronym he if
still in the acronym why to date the
podcast is still Luis's we had made
a 50% company
By the way if you want some advice
never make a 50% company because if you
find yourself in a Mexican stalemate
like this it becomes problematic to
carry everything forward so in fact
today Luis is not he doesn't participate in the
episodes he doesn't participate in anything that

Selvaggio and that instead I carry
forward with great
internal difficulties let's say
until I hope a solution is found
This is what
this is what happened not
me I continue through Louis's management he
knows that since he is still his the
podcast is always welcome to come and
do episodes these microphones are
open
to give any type of explanation
in total freedom and transparency if I
should have said something that does not
correspond to the truth or if I had said
something that in short needs more
clarity but what you need to know
is that Luis will not be there so
basically those who
followed the podcast only for Luis should
know that Luis is no longer there so if
you can kindly vent under this
video and show a little respect for the

thing probably will not happen but Here let's

disrespect towards the
guests
as regards Martin I have not I have
never heard from him personally
during the episodes if Luis contacted him
So it goes accordingly that
Martin will not not participate in the

else can I say It
is obvious that it is a situation
that I am sorry that has brought me a lot of
displeasure Not so much for the format itself
as you can imagine not so much because
I am aware that the narrative that I have
will be done and that is still being done is
Fedez argues with everyone but the thing that
saddens me the most is that it is for work
a relationship that went
beyond work has broken down So it is
not it was not it was
not an easy period because
I cared a lot about Luis I think In short, you have
all seen it in these years and
if you haven't seen it anyway know
that I cared a lot about
this relationship and consequently it
is strange to
carry on this thing alone
but I don't feel like
throwing away three years of
work anyway as regards the new
Musk Selvaggio I
really have to thank Davide Marra
because he was close to me In a
very very complex moment to manage even
emotionally he helped me
to give myself a method and I think that I wouldn't
want to avoid the misunderstanding of having to make
a comparison with the old Musk
Selvaggio the new Musk Selvaggio I
simply believe that it is different and
in its diversity it has things
that work better and things
that instead will never be able to
be like before
I was talking about the spontaneity and
light-heartedness that was there before it is
inevitable that at this moment I
myself cannot bring it to this
table but
in return I
notice that there is a greater attention to
the contents it has certainly
become a podcast a little more serious than
before a little less silly
I hope with time I will be able to
bring out this part a little
more fun At the moment I can't do it
and therefore I don't feel like
forcing myself in this sense so
These were the
long-
awaited explanations I think that by now
anyone had somehow understood it you
could let's say intuit but it was right to
give them to you and I think it was right to

happen in the future it
is precisely for the future I hope that we
can find a solution because
obviously
Musk Wild remains a Format made
to have fun and I hope that things don't get

my intention to make this
project become something that could
in some way complicate my life Here
and therefore I hope I hope this and

Wild Bye friends
